body_html: the numpy in pip uses openblas, if openblas and mkl load in the same process (atleast can repro this on OSX), our torch.dot function gives incorrect (and weird) results, because of some fortran convention screw-up. There's that to fix before I'd be comfortable approving this (if we leave out mkl, mkl-devel)

body: the numpy in `pip` uses openblas, if openblas and mkl load in the same process (atleast can repro this on OSX), our `torch.dot` function gives incorrect (and weird) results, because of some fortran convention screw-up. There's that to fix before I'd be comfortable approving this (if we leave out mkl, mkl-devel)
